backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and per‑user manga entry CRUD with blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components, hooks, and styles for reference.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the manga list page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first-time users to enter and save their display name before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure with authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist document for manually verifying Add Manga dialog layout and scrolling behavior across viewports.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog component for creating a new manga entry with validation, form state, and submission via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: UI field for adding, uploading, previewing, and removing manga cover images using ExternalBlob.
Displays a compact manga entry card with cover, title, rating, progress, status, and genre badges.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list page handling pagination, backend readiness states, error messaging, and add‑manga dialog control.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Pagination UI with numbered pages and ellipsis logic for navigating manga list pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Enhances useActor with backend readiness checks, retry logic, and combined connection/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries when the actor is ready and the user is authenticated, with limited retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Provides a readiness check for the backend using react-query with retry, backoff, and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the current user's profile, gated by actor readiness and authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Builds a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries using memoization.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Defines mutations for adding, updating, and deleting manga entries, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a paginated manga page, requiring actor readiness, authentication, and retrying only transient errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming and gold-accent utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories for retry logic and user messaging.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements exponential backoff utilities and a retry manager for controlled async retries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing existing features, versions, and functional summaries for the IC dapp template.
